subject: The transition of a legend
author: bhali333
full_text:
I would like to express my profound condolences to the family and 
friends of Sarah Estep. 

Although I am not saddened by her crossing, because I know she will 
have a special seat at the table.

I did not know Ms. Estep personally but I knew of her and her 
accomplishments in the field of EVP.

She was a trail blazing pioneer that forged a way of light for all that 
would follow. She and her wisdom will be sorely missed.

I'm sure that we have not heard the last from this amazing woman.

Bruce Halliday
